Author: tartansheep
Text: They didn’t seem too fussed because I don’t purge any more. Well, I do definitely over exercise, but they just say exercise is good for bipolar lol. I also have got my period back. They don’t seem to massively be too bothered that I was underweight and only gained the weight from medication-induced binging rather than healing my relationship with food...   Thanks. Idk what to do. I feel if I got back to where I used to be, they might take it more seriously.

Author: SxinnyLoxe
Text: Would it be possible for you to get diagnosed with EDNOS at least? Like there’s definitely an unhealthy relationship with food there and it’s important for a medical professional to acknowledge that so that you can get help, and a diagnosis which would maybe give you some validation.
